doc.field: Includes a group shot of a military band; of individuals dancing; a group shot with HRL next to a plane; HRL with General Jang Chun Yao? and other officials; various shots with and without HRL and members of U.S. and Chinese military and civilians; HRL with Teddy White?; photos from Tsingtao, China; group shot with HRL in swimming trunks on a beach; group shot with HRL in front of a temple; HRL with Chang Yu Ju?; group shot of HRL with Chinese journalists under the banner "Welcome Mr. Henry Luce, The Most Famous Journalist, From the Journalists Association of Tsingtao" and other shots of journalists waiting for his arrival; group shots of people eating; group shot taken at Chan Shan, China; two men in a Chinese printshop? with a "Welcome to Mr. Henry Luce" poster; aerial views of a Chinese city; HRL inspects fruit at a bazaar in Lalijan (possibly from HRL's Iran trip); HRL with Charles J. Murphy in Shanghai; HRL with Generals H. S. Aurand and Robert McClure in Kunming; a group shot with autographs from most of the individuals pictured; and a group shot of HRL addressing the North China Press Association.

Also includes photographs from HRL's 1941 trip to China which includes a group shot with HRL and Clare Boothe Luce at a table; HRL in front of a large group of Chinese soldiers; HRL next to a man raising his hand in greeting to the camera; and HRL walking from a boat landing.
